inputs.name: torqueEndpoint
inputs.label: Torque server URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Torque end point to use. If needed, click on 'manage', and add a new service connection of type 'Torque Service connection'

inputs.name: space
inputs.label: Space name

inputs.name: timeout
inputs.label: Timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set the timeout for this step (in minutes), if your Green will not be deleted when the timeout is reached, Torque will fail the task.

inputs.label: Production Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the ID of the Production you want to end. Use $(Torque.Production_Id) if you have the Deploy Production Green task in the pipeline.
